list.name: market
list.query: SELECT condition_id AS __value, argMax(question, updated_at) AS __text FROM polymarket.markets_dim WHERE updated_at >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND computed_category = 'Sports' AND question LIKE '%JD Gaming%' GROUP BY condition_id ORDER BY __text LIMIT 200

targets.rawSql: SELECT ts AS time, level, bid_px AS "Bid", ask_px AS "Ask" FROM polymarket.orderbook_levels WHERE condition_id = '${market}' AND level = 1 AND $__timeFilter(ts) AND bid_px IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts
